column5: The home is located towards the outskirts of The Woodlands.The Woodlands is unique in its beauty, diversity, convenience and comfort.You can experience all of its beauty on your own in the comfort of your own personal vacation retreat.The house may look small from the outside, but many guests feel at home due to the rustic d√©cor. Our goal in furnishing the property was to give our guests maximal comfort.This model home is perfect for weekend getaways or longer work related stays and for families
